TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how the parent row labels of a control are displayed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ParentRowsLabelStyle%2A> property.
Parent rows can be displayed only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> contains at least one <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> to a second <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to a value that allows navigation.
## Examples The following example iterates through each of the possible values for the DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle.
[!code-vb[Classic DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_129_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle Both = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Displays both the parent table and column names.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle ColumnName = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridParentRowsLabelStyle TableName = int32(1)
